Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a high-efficiency technology for combined heat and power (CHP) generation.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Heat and power production can be varied according to changes in heat and power loads, which affect the electrical and thermal efficiencies.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: This study analyzes changes in heat and power production rates of a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming (SESR) and SOFC system.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The variations in the stack-to-burner ratio (bio-oil split fractions), fuel utilization factor (U-f), and recirculation ratio (R) are investigated.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The effect of heat-to-power ratio on the system performance and CO2 capture efficiencies is also studied.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Moreover, the benefit of the implementation of a bio-oil SESR and SOFC system over a conventional operation to match the energy demand for an industrial case is evaluated.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results reveal that an increase in U-f decreases the operating range of the heat-to-power ratio.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: On the other hand, the anode gas recirculation ratio affects such a parameter when the system performs at the high stack-to-burner ratio.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: A higher heat-to-power ratio increases the stack electrical and thermal efficiencies, leading to a higher CHP efficiency.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The heat-to-power ratio of the proposed system varies between 0.05 and 7.5.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: However, to attain a CO2 capture efficiency higher than 50%, the heat-to-power ratio should be lower than 1.5.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: By comparing the two operational strategies: fixed heat-to-power ratio, and variable heat-to-power ratio, it is found that the heat-to-power ratio is an important factor for energy management.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The primary energy saving is enhanced when the system is operated to satisfy the rates of heat and power demand.
Titulo: Assessment of heat-to-power ratio in a bio-oil sorption enhanced steam reforming and solid oxide fuel cell system
